title: The Eternal Witch
description:
All is fair in war and magic.I’m the Aether Witch. I have power no other witch has had in thousands of years.But even I can’t do this job alone. Salem’s Prophecy says the fate of the world lies on mine and my twin’s hands. Despite our Coven-mates thriving power and Heavenly intentions...In the end, the decision is ours. And ours alone. To close the Gap in Salem before Samhain we must collect all five Elemental Stones. The quest to find them sends us deep into the treacherous lands of other supernatural species - where The Coven is far from welcome and heavily outnumbered. To succeed we’ll have to use tricks we’ve never played with before and pray we all make it out alive.I thought I had a flawless plan, but now nothing is playing out the way I expected. My whole Coven is looking to me for guidance. Tennessee’s faith in me is so strong I want to believe it’s true and Emersyn trusts me to lead us in the right direction.But I’m not sure she should...
The magic continues in The Eternal Witch, the fifth book in the adventure-filled Elemental Magic series that’s leaving readers begging for more!
author: Chandelle LaVaun
